title: Provide Documents for a Program Audit
description: A state auditor is conducting an audit of a public housing program and has requested specific case files.

tasks.description: Receive the official request from the auditor, identifying the specific case files needed.
tasks.expected_outcome: The program manager logs the audit request.

tasks.description: Search for and retrieve the requested case files from the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager successfully gathers all requested digital case files.

tasks.description: Provide the documents to the auditor through a secure transfer method.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager securely transmits the files to the auditor.
